name: Suma y Sigue
description:
This is a game to practice calculation speed with addition, subtraction and multiplication.

There are several levels of difficulty that can be selected from the options.
Lives, response time and game mode can be configured.

It is valid so that children from 7 years old can practice sums in an easy and fun way.

For older children you can change to subtraction or multiplication mode, or the random mode in which the different operations are alternated.
